ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Danish Defence Acquisition and Logistics Organizations

ADDRESS_CONTRACTING_BODY.OFFICIALNAME: Danish Defence Acquisition and Logistics Organizations

TITLE.P: Acquisition and Sustainment of Mobile Sensor Systems

SHORT_DESCR.P: The contract notice concerns DALO's award of framework agreements for the procurement of mobile sensor systems, services and spare parts. The acquisition is divided into 2 framework agreements:
1) A framework agreement (acquisition contract) concerning the acquisition of the mobile sensor systems; and
2) A framework agreement (sustainment contract) concerning mainly services and spare parts related to the mobile sensor systems.
The acquisition contract and sustainment contract are to be seen as a whole and will be awarded to the same supplier.

TEXT.P: Six (6) lists of the most important similar deliveries (references), cf. Section II.1.5) carried out within the past 5(five) years prior to the deadline for the request to participate (X September 2014- X September 2019). The 3 lists concerning low weight sensor systems shall contain information regarding references for:

The candidate must demonstrate experience with as a minimum one similar delivery, cf. Section III.2.3) of the contract notice and as described in template 5, within each of below mentioned categories within the past 5 years prior to the deadline for the request to participate (October 6th 2014 – October 6th 2019).
